harp.title: Harp
harp.description: The static web server with built-in preprocessing. Write LESS, Markdown, CoffeeScript and more as easily as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

cordova.title: Apache Cordova
cordova.description: PhoneGap, renamed to Cordova, is now thriving as part of the Apache foundation where it will remain free and open source.

phonegap.title: PhoneGap
phonegap.description: PhoneGap was invented and first authored by Chloi founders Brock Whitten and Rob Ellis, along with Eric Oesterle at iPhoneDevCamp 2.

natural.title: Natural
natural.description: A general natural language facility for Node. Includes tokenizing, classification, phonetics, similarity, and more.

xui.title: xui
xui.description: A tiny JavaScript framework for mobile web apps. Championed by Rob Ellis in 2009, it laid the foundation for libraries like Zepto.

dbox.title: dbox
dbox.description: The Node SDK for the Dropbox API

apricot.title: apricot
apricot.description: A simple Hpricot Clone for Node.

normalize-opentype-css.title: Normalize-OpenType.css
normalize-opentype-css.description: Adds OpenType features—ligatures, kerning, and more—to Normalize.css.

intercom.title: intercom
intercom.description: The Node SDK for the Intercom.io API.

earley.title: earley-node
earley.description: A Context Free Gramar written in Node.

harp-toolbar.title: harp-toolbar
harp-toolbar.description: An OS X menubar app for Harp.

rolodex.title: rolodex
rolodex.description: A Node user management system using Redis.

thug.title: thug
thug.description: ORM replacement that provides a functional style object filtration and validation system.

waterfront.title: waterfront
waterfront.description: A generic message broker system on top of ZeroMQ with discovery patterns for push/pull, req/rep, pub/sub.

yoke.title: yoke
yoke.description: A preprocessor for language agnostic file concatenation.

chasers.title: chasers
chasers.description: Neat helpers, making complex, mobile-first layouts a little easier.

straight-up.title: straight-up
straight-up.description: A lightweight, fluid grid framework: Neat without Bourbon.

big-ideas-text.title: big-ideas-text
big-ideas-text.description: Dynamically scale lines of text within a container—but “Don’t get any / big ideas.”
